summary: This mod will allow you to recruit Alexstrasza to join you on your adventures. You will need to first complete a tiny quest before you get her. ApachiiSkyHair is neccesary.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s12.postimg.org/usmprgfb1/sddefault.png[/img]
This mod will allow you to recruit [b]Alexstrasza [/b]to join you on your adventures. You will need to first complete a tiny quest before you get her. [b]ApachiiSkyHair[/b] is neccesary.

You will be able to find her in [b]Uttering Hills Cave[/b]. I recommend that you do the [b]Kill the Bandit Leader: Uttering Hills Cave [/b]quest while searching for Alexstrasza, it'll make for some interesting results, and you'll get extra [b]exp[/b]. You can get the quest fromÂ [b]Brunwulf Free-Winter [/b]in [b]Windhelm[/b].

She is very loyal and comes with a sweet set of ebony armor, as well as an enchanted greatsword. Credit goes to MMOxReview for creating this awesome character!
author: ShadowOrc
